mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.hidden, p.title, p.path, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.level, p.button_type, p.parent_id, p.sort, p.description, p.status, p.url FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
